Welcome, Alona and Sepha. I have been waiting
Are you hearing voices too, or is that
I think it's coming from the shrine.
Is this the voice of Galhyde?
Indeed. The Celestial Realm is in
We represent chaos, while they represent order.
We have always had our differences, but it is
our balance which keeps your world of
But now Reinox, Lord of Monarchs,
has decided our powers are too strong,
and fears that chaos will soon consume the world.
And thus, he has riled up his devout followers
Your king stands at the helm
of this crusade, and it is only a matter of time
But why now? What has changed? Why does
Reinox suddenly see you as a
I'm afraid that I do not know.
But what I do know is this: the threat
is real. Both Astoraia and the
Celestial Realm are in grave danger.
What do we do to stop them?
For now we can handle the Celestial Realm, but
our ability to influence the mortal realm is
limited. We can only manifest ourselves in a
However, we can bestow our power to champions to
fight on our behalf. There is no doubt Reinox
has already moved to do so.
You, Alona, are the only one in Somerland I can
But know that what I ask of you
will put you in grave danger.
As the God of Earth, I foster the nourishment and growth
of all nature. I give great care to all life around me,
and ensure they flourish and thrive to their fullest
I have seen your earnest desire to protect those around you. I
have seen the great care you give to these woods and this
Your purity and resolve may be the hope we need
in this time. I can think of no better champion to represent
This will be a very dangerous journey.
If you believe you are up to the task, then
I shall test you in battle. You must be prepared
I'll stick by you no matter what Alona!
I know you wanted to be a Paladin,
but this might be our chance to go and make a
You're right. It's hard to ignore it if Galhyde
tells us the world is in danger. But can we
I cannot lie to you: It will not be easy journey.
I would normally not involve someone so young, and
there are many things still unclear to me at this time.
But I truly believe in your potential. Rarely have I met
someone as kind and brave as you. I
believe you will be a beacon of hope for this world.
Alright, I'll do it. If I'm honest, it all seems so daunting.
I really don't know what awaits us out there.
But I know I can't sit around knowing
the world is in danger! If you think I can help
protect this world, I'll do it!
That is good to hear. Now, show me your strength!
Show me your resolve in battle!
Here we go Alona, get ready!
Very good. I am impressed with your skills in battle.
You have become truly strong Alona. You are ready for
Alona gained the title: Galhyde's Champion!
Seek out Saeritt, the Goddess of
Fire. She resides at the top of the volcano
to the west of this island. She will be able
Zel! What are you doing here?
I'm here on a mission from the king.
By order of King Laudius, the Elementals
Purged?! What kind of nonsense are you talking
about? Galhyde has always protected us!
Reinox is wrong about the Elementals!
It seems like you already know then.
The Triumvirate feels that chaos will consume
the world if the Elementals are not stopped.
It is my duty as a Paladin of the Shintei Empire to
carry out the will of the king. The will of Reinox
is the will of the king.
Therefore, it is my duty to see it through. I don't
want to hurt you, so stand aside.
You know that's crazy! If the protection of
be helpless against all the monsters in the
Of course I know that! I don't want to do this
But I am a Paladin of the king. First and foremost, I serve
King Laudius and the king's orders are absolute.
If Reinox wants the king to destroy the Elementals, then it
is my duty to do so.
I don't know what's gotten into him but we
can't let him destroy this shrine! The villagers
will have no chance if we don't.
You're a Paladin! A protector of the empire!
You were supposed to protect us!
You proimsed me we would protect everyone together! What
you're doing is the opposite of that!
I'm sorry, being a Paladin is not what you think.
Ultimately, I serve the king. I cannot disobey
Besides, if Reinox is right, there will be nobody left to
protect if the Elementals destroy us all.
I'm sorry, but there is no other way. I must do this.
I won't ask again: stand aside.
I don't want to fight you. But you promised we would protect
Somerland together. If you won't carry our promise, then I'll
I don't care if you're the older brother.
This time it's my turn to knock some sense
I don't want to fight you, but you leave me no
choice. I'll have to move you aside by force!
Why...? Why are you doing this? Why won't you listen...?
I'm sorry, Alona. It wasn't supposed to be
like this. I wanted to protect Somerland...everyone...
This is bad, without the shrine's protection
Somerland will be attacked by monsters!
Sepha! Wake up! We need to get home fast!
Ugh, my head is killing me.
We don't have time! We need to get back and
What about Zel? Where's my brother? I can't
believe he'd do something like this!
I don't know. I have so many questions I want to
ask him right now. But right now,
we need to hurry or Somerland will be in serious danger!
Yeah, you're right. Sorry. Let's get back to
town and make sure everyone is okay!
Aren't you supposed to be in class? Besides,
